content: I’m Zhiwei Shao (邵志伟), currently a fourth year undergraduate student at School of Astronomy and Space Science, Nanjing University. My main research interests focus on cosmology and galaxy evolution, while currently I’m also working on the kilonova ejecta structure associated with AT 2017gfo. You can find my CV here for more details.
